bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of jing bing 經病 , menstrual disease, in which a woman older than 50 years continues to menstruate, with the duration of each menstruation exceeding normal periods. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry qian cao 茜草 quotes Jing yan fang 經驗方 : 五旬行經：婦人五十 後，經水不止者，作敗血論 , “ Menstruation beyond age 50 : When a woman who is older than 50 years continues to menstruate, one must take into account that [an internal disease may] have made her blood rot”.
